verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w prince|strong="H5057"\w* of \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* lifted \w up|strong="H1361"\w*, and thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* a \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, I \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \add in\add* the \w seat|strong="H4186"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*; yet thou \add art\add* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and not \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, though thou \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* as the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:\f + \fr 28.2 \ft midst: Heb. heart\f*
Behold, thou \add art\add* \w wiser|strong="H2450"\w* than \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*; there is no \w secret|strong="H5640"\w* that they can \w hide|strong="H6004"\w* from thee:

With thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and with thine \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* thou hast \w gotten|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w riches|strong="H2428"\w*, and hast \w gotten|strong="H6213"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* into thy \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*:

By thy \w great|strong="H7230"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \add and\add* by thy \w traffick|strong="H7404"\w* hast thou \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* thy \w riches|strong="H2428"\w*, and thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* is lifted \w up|strong="H1361"\w* because of thy \w riches|strong="H2428"\w*:\f + \fr 28.5 \ft thy great…: Heb. the greatness of thy wisdom\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thou hast \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* as the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*;

Behold, therefore I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* upon thee, the \w terrible|strong="H6184"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: and they shall \w draw|strong="H7324"\w* their \w swords|strong="H2719"\w* against the \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w* of thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and they shall \w defile|strong="H2490"\w* thy \w brightness|strong="H3314"\w*.

They shall bring thee \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*, and thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w* the \w deaths|strong="H4463"\w* of \add them that are\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*.

Wilt thou \w yet|strong="H0559"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him that \w slayeth|strong="H2026"\w* thee, I \add am\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? but thou \add shalt be\add* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and no \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of him that \w slayeth|strong="H2490"\w* thee.\f + \fr 28.9 \ft of him that slayeth: or, of him that woundeth\f*

Thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w* the \w deaths|strong="H4194"\w* of the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*: for I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
¶ Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w* upon the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Thou sealest \w up|strong="H2856"\w* the \w sum|strong="H8508"\w*, \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and \w perfect|strong="H3632"\w* in \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*.

Thou hast been in \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w* the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; every \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \add was\add* thy \w covering|strong="H4540"\w*, the \w sardius|strong="H0124"\w*, \w topaz|strong="H6357"\w*, and the \w diamond|strong="H3095"\w*, the \w beryl|strong="H8658"\w*, the \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w*, and the \w jasper|strong="H3471"\w*, the \w sapphire|strong="H5601"\w*, the \w emerald|strong="H5306"\w*, and the \w carbuncle|strong="H1304"\w*, and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: the \w workmanship|strong="H4399"\w* of thy \w tabrets|strong="H8596"\w* and of thy \w pipes|strong="H5345"\w* was \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* in thee in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that thou wast \w created|strong="H1254"\w*.\f + \fr 28.13 \ft sardius: or, ruby\f*\f + \fr 28.13 \ft beryl: or, chrysolite\f*\f + \fr 28.13 \ft emerald: or, chrysoprase\f*

Thou \add art\add* the \w anointed|strong="H4473"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* that \w covereth|strong="H5526"\w*; and I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thee \add so:\add* thou wast upon the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; thou hast walked up and \w down|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

Thou \add wast\add* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* in thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* from the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that thou wast \w created|strong="H1254"\w*, till \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in thee.

By the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thy \w merchandise|strong="H7404"\w* they have \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee with \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*, and thou hast \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*: therefore I will cast thee as \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* out of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and I will \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* thee, O \w covering|strong="H5526"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*, from the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

Thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* was lifted \w up|strong="H1361"\w* because of thy \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, thou hast \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* by reason \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w brightness|strong="H3314"\w*: I will \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* thee to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, I will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, that they may \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* thee.

Thou hast \w defiled|strong="H2490"\w* thy \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w* by the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thine \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, by the \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* of thy \w traffick|strong="H7404"\w*; therefore will I bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee, it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* thee, and I will \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* thee to \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all them that \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* thee.

All they that \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* at thee: thou shalt be a \w terror|strong="H1091"\w*, and \w never|strong="H0369"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* any \w more|strong="H5704"\w*.\f + \fr 28.19 \ft a terror: Heb. terrors\f*
¶ Again the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against it,

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, O \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*; and I will be \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee: and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, when I shall have \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* in her, and shall be \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* in her.

For I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* into her \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, and \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* into her \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*; and the \w wounded|strong="H2491"\w* shall be \w judged|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of her by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon her on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And there shall be no more a \w pricking|strong="H3992"\w* \w brier|strong="H5544"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, nor \add any\add* \w grieving|strong="H3510"\w* \w thorn|strong="H6975"\w* of all \add that are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them, that \w despised|strong="H7590"\w* them; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; When I shall have \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* among whom they are \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*, and shall be \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* in them in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, then shall they \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in their \w land|strong="H0127"\w* that I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

And they shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w* therein, and shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*; yea, they shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with \w confidence|strong="H0983"\w*, when I have \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* upon all those that \w despise|strong="H7590"\w* them round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 28.26 \ft safely: or, with confidence\f*\f + \fr 28.26 \ft despise: or, spoil\f*
